samples.text: A man and a woman demonstrate and explain various exercises in a living room setting, with the woman performing movements as guided by the man.

[4] This sequence depicts a woman demonstrating violin playing techniques in a home setting. It involves musical instruction, not physical exercise.

[5] This sequence involves a group performing a dance routine in a staged setting, which involves exercise but lacks the specific interaction of guided exercises by one individual to another as described in the query.
